title: Margaux’s Design Intervention
description: Margaux is here to help. She takes your uninspired living space and turns it into the perfect palace of your dreams. No matter how outdated your design sense, she can help you. Her only flaw? Sometimes she cares too much.
quote: I’m about to stage a Design Intervention!
altHero: Margaux Needler, a woman with a huge blonde hairdo
alt1: Margaux revealing a design to a client who is shocked in a good way
alt2: Margaux fixing a toilet on the lawn
alt4: a man holds up two nails and Margaux chooses one
